description.zh-cn: 香港男歌手及演员，1990年代香港“四大天王”之一。他出生于北京，年幼时移民香港。在音乐上，他以情歌和开创性的电子舞曲闻名；在影视方面，他凭《三更之回家》获得金马奖最佳男主角。同时，他长期投身慈善公益，曾任联合国儿童基金会国际青年特使，并获香港特别行政区政府颁授银紫荆星章。
description.en: A Hong Kong singer and actor, one of the "Four Heavenly Kings" of Hong Kong in the 1990s. Born in Beijing, he immigrated to Hong Kong as a child. In music, he is known for his love ballads and pioneering electronic dance music; in film, he won the Golden Horse Award for Best Actor for "Three: Going Home". He is also a long-time philanthropist, having served as a UNICEF International Young Envoy and was awarded the Silver Bauhinia Star by the HKSAR Government.

description.zh-cn: 香港模特儿及演员，黎明的前妻。
description.en: A Hong Kong model and actress, ex-wife of Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 印尼归国华侨，黎明之父。
description.en: An Indonesian returned overseas Chinese, father of Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首都，黎明的出生地。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China, birthplace of Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一所中学，黎明曾在此就读。
description.en: A secondary school in Hong Kong, which Leon Lai attended.

description.zh-cn: 位于英国伦敦的私立寄宿学校，黎明曾在此留学。
description.en: A private boarding school in London, UK, where Leon Lai studied.

description.zh-cn: 英国的一所学院，黎明在离开Christ's College后转入此校。
description.en: A college in the UK where Leon Lai transferred after leaving Christ's College.

description.zh-cn: 一家国际唱片公司，黎明于1989年至1998年间签约于此，期间奠定其天王地位。
description.en: An international record company to which Leon Lai was signed from 1989 to 1998, establishing his status as a Heavenly King during this period.

description.zh-cn: 索尼音乐娱乐的香港分公司。黎明于1998年至2004年间加盟，期间在音乐风格上作出许多电子舞曲的尝试。
description.en: The Hong Kong branch of Sony Music Entertainment. Leon Lai joined from 1998 to 2004, during which he experimented extensively with electronic dance music styles.

zh-cn: 东亚唱片制作有限公司

description.zh-cn: 由黎明和林建岳于2004年合作成立的香港唱片公司。
description.en: A Hong Kong record company co-founded by Leon Lai and Peter Lam in 2004.

description.zh-cn: 联合国下属机构，致力于维护全球儿童的权利。黎明于1994年获委任为该组织的国际爱心大使，后晋升为国际青年特使。
description.en: A United Nations agency dedicated to upholding the rights of children worldwide. In 1994, Leon Lai was appointed as its International Ambassador of Goodwill and was later promoted to International Young Envoy.

en: The Community Chest of Hong Kong

description.zh-cn: 香港的一个非政府、非牟利的慈善机构。黎明长期担任其筹募委员会委员及董事会成员，现为名誉副会长。
description.en: A non-governmental, non-profit charitable organization in Hong Kong. Leon Lai has long served as a member of its Campaign Committee and Board of Directors, and is currently an Honorary Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 1966年至1976年间在中国发生的一场政治运动。黎明的父亲作为归国华侨，在此期间曾被批斗。
description.en: A political movement that took place in China from 1966 to 1976. Leon Lai's father, as a returned overseas Chinese, was subjected to struggle sessions during this period.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深演员，黎明的谊父（干爹）。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong actor and the godfather of Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，黎明的谊母（干妈）。
description.en: A Hong Kong businesswoman and the godmother of Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 黎明求学时期的朋友，自1992年起长期担任其助手。
description.en: A friend of Leon Lai from his school days, who has been his assistant since 1992.

description.zh-cn: 1986年举办的香港歌唱比赛，黎明在此次比赛中获得铜奖，从而正式进入演艺界。
description.en: A Hong Kong singing competition held in 1986, where Leon Lai won the bronze award, officially launching his career in the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名歌唱老师，曾教导黎明乐理知识及歌唱技巧，并为他争取到宝丽金的试音机会。
description.en: A renowned singing coach in Hong Kong who taught Leon Lai music theory and vocal techniques, and secured him an audition with PolyGram.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名填词人及唱片监制。在担任宝丽金监制期间，他认为黎明形象吸引且有潜力，最终决定与他签约。
description.en: A famous Hong Kong lyricist and record producer. During his tenure as a producer at PolyGram, he found Leon Lai's image appealing and saw his potential, ultimately deciding to sign him.

description.zh-cn: 香港传奇巨星。他曾公开赞赏黎明，并于1993年为黎明颁发“最受欢迎男歌星”奖项。
description.en: A legendary Hong Kong superstar. He publicly praised Leon Lai and presented him with the 'Most Popular Male Singer' award in 1993.

description.zh-cn: 中国著名声乐教育家。1995年，黎明曾到北京中国音乐学院跟他学习乐理和发声技巧。
description.en: A famous Chinese vocal educator. In 1995, Leon Lai went to the China Conservatory of Music in Beijing to study music theory and vocal techniques with him.

description.zh-cn: 位于北京的音乐高等学府。1995年，黎明曾在此进修，师从金铁霖。
description.en: An institution of higher learning for music located in Beijing. In 1995, Leon Lai studied here under the tutelage of Jin Tielin.

description.zh-cn: 香港资深电影人及经理人，长期担任黎明的经理人。
description.en: A veteran Hong Kong filmmaker and manager, who has long been Leon Lai's manager.

description.zh-cn: 香港著名音乐制作人。自1996年起与黎明合作，两人共同创作了大量流行电子舞曲，被视为乐坛最佳拍档之一。
description.en: A renowned Hong Kong music producer. He has collaborated with Leon Lai since 1996, and together they created numerous popular electronic dance tracks, being regarded as one of the best partnerships in the music industry.

description.zh-cn: 香港商人，寰亚传媒集团主席。2004年与黎明合作成立了唱片公司A Music。
description.en: A Hong Kong businessman and chairman of Media Asia Group. In 2004, he co-founded the record label A Music with Leon Lai.

description.zh-cn: 香港主要的电视台之一。黎明演艺生涯早期曾签约于此，后因故被雪藏。
description.en: One of the major television stations in Hong Kong. Leon Lai was signed to the station in his early career and was later put on hold due to certain incidents.

description.zh-cn: 由陈可辛执导，黎明主演的经典香港电影。黎明在片中饰演的黎小军一角深入人心，该片被视为其演艺事业的重要分水岭，使其演技获得广泛认可。
description.en: A classic Hong Kong film directed by Peter Chan and starring Leon Lai. His portrayal of the character Lai Siu-kwan was highly acclaimed, and the film is considered a major turning point in his acting career, earning him widespread recognition for his performance.

description.zh-cn: 一部恐怖片，由陈可辛监制，黎明主演。黎明凭此片获得了第39届金马奖最佳男主角。
description.en: A horror film produced by Peter Chan and starring Leon Lai. Lai won the Best Leading Actor award at the 39th Golden Horse Awards for his role in this film.

description.zh-cn: 大韩民国第16任总统。他曾于2003年在清华大学演讲时，提及黎明是在韩国家喻户晓的艺人。
description.en: The 16th President of the Republic of Korea. In a 2003 speech at Tsinghua University, he mentioned that Leon Lai was a household name in South Korea.

description.zh-cn: 黎明于1991年成立的官方歌迷会，是全球唯一获得他授权的歌迷组织。
description.en: The official fan club of Leon Lai, established in 1991. It is the only fan organization globally authorized by him.

description.zh-cn: 黎明于2014年开始执导的电影，他同时参与了剧本创作和演员选角等幕后工作。
description.en: A film directed by Leon Lai starting from 2014, for which he also participated in behind-the-scenes work such as screenwriting and casting.

description.zh-cn: 黎明是A Music的创始人之一，并作为旗下艺人。
description.en: Leon Lai is one of the founders of A Music and is also an artist under the label.

position.zh-cn: 名誉副会长、董事会成员、筹募委员会委员
position.en: Honorary Vice President, Board Member, Campaign Committee Member

description.zh-cn: 黎明在该比赛中获得铜奖，这成为他投身演艺事业的契机。
description.en: Leon Lai won the bronze award in this competition, which served as his opportunity to enter the entertainment industry.

description.zh-cn: 委任黎明为全球首个华人国际爱心大使，后于1995年晋升为国际青年特使。
description.en: Appointed Leon Lai as the first-ever Chinese International Goodwill Ambassador, and he was promoted to International Young Envoy in 1995.

description.zh-cn: 作为印尼归国华侨，黎明的父亲黎新生在文化大革命期间遭到批斗。
description.en: As a returned overseas Chinese from Indonesia, Leon Lai's father, Lai Sun-sang, was subjected to struggle sessions during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 黎明是胡枫的谊子（干儿子）。
description.en: Leon Lai is the godson of Bowie Wu.

description.zh-cn: 黎明是张黄小清的谊子（干儿子）。
description.en: Leon Lai is the godson of Cheung Wong Siu-ching.

description.zh-cn: 彭霭泉是黎明在求学时期认识的朋友，并自1992年起长期担任其助手。
description.en: Peng Aiquan is a friend whom Leon Lai met during his school years and has been his long-term assistant since 1992.

description.zh-cn: 戴思聪是黎明的歌唱老师，向他传授乐理知识及歌唱发声技巧。
description.en: Tai See-chung was Leon Lai's singing coach, teaching him music theory and vocal techniques.

description.zh-cn: 替黎明向宝丽金唱片公司争取到试音机会，促成了他与宝丽金的签约。
description.en: Secured an audition opportunity for Leon Lai with PolyGram Records, which led to his signing with the label.

description.zh-cn: 作为时任宝丽金监制，在考虑了黎明的形象和发展潜力后，决定与他签订歌手合约。
description.en: As the producer at PolyGram at the time, he decided to sign a singer contract with Leon Lai after considering his image and development potential.

description.zh-cn: 曾当面赞赏黎明，并在1993年度劲歌金曲颁奖典礼上为他颁发“最受欢迎男歌星”奖，对他有很大鼓励作用。
description.en: He once praised Leon Lai in person and presented him with the 'Most Popular Male Singer' award at the 1993 Jade Solid Gold Best Ten Music Awards Presentation, which was a great encouragement to him.

description.zh-cn: 1995年，黎明到北京中国音乐学院跟金铁霖学习乐理、古典音乐和发声技巧。
description.en: In 1995, Leon Lai went to the China Conservatory of Music in Beijing to study music theory, classical music, and vocal techniques with Jin Tielin.

description.zh-cn: 自1996年开始合作，被视为乐坛中的最佳拍档之一。
description.en: They began collaborating in 1996 and are considered one of the best partnerships in the music industry.

description.zh-cn: 因生病、迟到等缘故，黎明被指工作态度欠佳而遭到无线电视雪藏。
description.en: Due to illness and lateness, Leon Lai was accused of having a poor work attitude and was subsequently put on hold by TVB.

description.zh-cn: 这部电影使黎明的演技获得观众和影评人的广泛认同，被视为其演艺事业的重要分水岭，并让他首次获得香港电影金像奖最佳男主角提名。
description.en: This film earned Leon Lai widespread recognition from audiences and critics for his acting, is considered a major turning point in his career, and garnered him his first nomination for Best Actor at the Hong Kong Film Awards.

description.zh-cn: 黎明凭借在此片中的演出，获得了第39届金马奖最佳男主角。
description.en: For his performance in this film, Leon Lai won the Best Leading Actor award at the 39th Golden Horse Awards.

description.zh-cn: 前韩国总统卢武铉在清华大学的演讲中提及黎明是在韩国家喻户晓的艺人，这反映了黎明在韩国的文化影响力。
description.en: Former South Korean President Roh Moo-hyun mentioned in a speech at Tsinghua University that Leon Lai was a household name in South Korea, reflecting Lai's cultural influence in the country.

description.zh-cn: 黎明首次执导电影《抢红》，并参与剧本创作、演员选角等幕后工作。
description.en: Leon Lai directed the film 'Wine War' for the first time, and was also involved in behind-the-scenes work such as screenwriting and casting.
